steps.text: Ensure the surface is completely dry.
Mask areas with 3M™ Precision Masking Tape first, then back it up with 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape 301E or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape 244.
Mask the entire surface with 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film.
Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.
Hold spray gun 15cm-20cm from the surface and apply gelcoat.
Clean the new external composite surface with approved cleaner
Sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 320+ and then 400+ grade abrasives with a Soft Interface Pad
Sand scratch refinement using P1200 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs
Compound the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound and a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad
Use a Rotary Polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm
Clean the surface with approved cleaner
Using a DA sander with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 80+ grade abrasive discs, sand the surface
Apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler
After it sets, apply dry guide coat and sand with 120+ grade
Finally, clean the surface
Sand with 220+ grade
Ensure the surface is dry
Apply masking tapes and film as described in the gelcoat process
Mix primer in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup and apply with a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun
Apply dry guide coat and sand the primer with 320+ grade abrasive discs
Repeat with 400+ grade
Clean the surface
Mix paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup and apply with a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun
Clean the surface with an approved cleaner
Compounding
Compound with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Fast Cut Plus Extreme and a 3M™ wool or green foam compounding pad
Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm
Polishing
Polish the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish and a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad at 1400-1800 rpm
Protection
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries
Sand the bottom surface using a dual-action sander with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron²² TM 220+ grade abrasive
Clean the area
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler
After it cures, sand with 120+ grade abrasive
Finish with 220+ grade
Ensure the surface is dry
Apply masking tapes and film
